Information Magic is supplementary..."},{"lineNumber":11544,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦いにも生活にも、大した役には立たないって」","translatedEnglishLine":"It doesn't really help much in combat or daily life.\""},{"lineNumber":11545,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから……たぶん、どこかのお役所に勤めて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because of that... probably working at some government office,"},{"lineNumber":11546,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お給金の計算をして、生きていくん、だって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"calculating salaries to make a living... that's what it said.\""},{"lineNumber":11547,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………むう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":11548,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":11549,"originalJapaneseLine":"言った途端、ガンジー王子は困った表情をして、","translatedEnglishLine":"As soon as she said it, Prince Gandhi made a troubled face,"},{"lineNumber":11550,"originalJapaneseLine":"千鶴子はすぐに後悔した。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Chizuko immediately regretted it."},{"lineNumber":11551,"originalJapaneseLine":"目の前の物知らずの小娘を、","translatedEnglishLine":"He was wondering how to support this ignorant young girl in front of him without hurting thought that way."},{"lineNumber":11554,"originalJapaneseLine":"「教師で、その程度の認識なのか……参るな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A teacher with that level of understanding... it's hopeless.\""},{"lineNumber":11555,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":11556,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大きなものを扱えば扱うほど、情報は必要だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The bigger the things you handle, the more information you need."},{"lineNumber":11557,"originalJapaneseLine":"　会社、軍隊、国家……それを、地味などと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Companies, armies, nations... to call that plain...\""},{"lineNumber":11558,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あ、ありがとう、ございます……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-thank you very much...\""},{"lineNumber":11559,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや。……しかし、これが教育の現場か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No. ...But this is the reality of the education system...\""},{"lineNumber":11560,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガンジーは眉をひそめた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Gandhi frowned."},{"lineNumber":11561,"originalJapaneseLine":"「進学校でさえ、実態は貴族の社交場。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even prestigious schools are actually aristocratic social clubs."},{"lineNumber":11562,"originalJapaneseLine":"　身分によって、出す試験の内容さえ違う」","translatedEnglishLine":"The exams given differ according to one's social status.\""},{"lineNumber":11563,"originalJapaneseLine":"「無闇に易しい試験で高得点を取った者が、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Those who score high on arbitrarily easy exams"},{"lineNumber":11564,"originalJapaneseLine":"　成績優秀者となる……これでは、","translatedEnglishLine":"become top students... With this system,"},{"lineNumber":11565,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人材など育つわけがない」","translatedEnglishLine":"there's no way to cultivate true talent.\""},{"lineNumber":11566,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、王子殿下も、それを……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh, Your Highness, you also see that...\""},{"lineNumber":11567,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ。視察に来たのだがな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes. I came here to inspect."},{"lineNumber":11568,"originalJapaneseLine":"　教師陣はおべっかを使うばかりで……","translatedEnglishLine":"The teachers only flatter..."},{"lineNumber":11569,"originalJapaneseLine":"　内密に様子を探れば、こうだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"But when I secretly checked the situation, this is what I found.\""},{"lineNumber":11570,"originalJapaneseLine":"「裕福で向上心があれば家庭教師を雇うが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Those who are wealthy and ambitious hire private tutors,"},{"lineNumber":11571,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どちらかが欠けた時点で、","translatedEnglishLine":"but if either is missing,"},{"lineNumber":11572,"originalJapaneseLine":"　既に国を支えるような人材とはなりえない……」","translatedEnglishLine":"they cannot become the kind of talent that supports the country...\""},{"lineNumber":11573,"originalJapaneseLine":"苦悩に満ちた表情で、ガンジー王子は頭を振った。","translatedEnglishLine":"With a face full of anguish, Prince Gandhi shook his head."},{"lineNumber":11574,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私はな、山田君。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You see, Yamada-kun,"},{"lineNumber":11575,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この国を……変えたいと、思っている。","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to... change this country."},{"lineNumber":11576,"originalJapaneseLine":"　身分による差別や、旧弊を取りやめて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to abolish discrimination based on status and old customs...\""},{"lineNumber":11577,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...!\""},{"lineNumber":11578,"originalJapaneseLine":"「王に即位した際には、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When I ascend to the throne,"},{"lineNumber":11579,"originalJapaneseLine":"　実力ある者が素直に台頭し、力が振るえる。","translatedEnglishLine":"those with ability will rise honestly and wield power."},{"lineNumber":11580,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな社会にしたい」","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to create such a society.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かはすぐに分かったのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although I immediately knew who it was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不躾な驚きがそのままでてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: an impolite surprise slipped out naturally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの第一王子。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The First Prince of Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアーク・スーパー・ガンジー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ragnarok Arc Super Gandhi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「君は……おお、見た覚えがある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You are... oh, I remember seeing you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 情報魔法学でトップだった、山田君だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were the top in Information Magic Studies, Yamada-kun."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分を、把握されていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He had understood who I was.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな、雲の上の人が。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone so far above me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「違ったらすまないな。合っていたかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I'm wrong, I apologize. Was I correct?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、ッ……はい、はい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes, yes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: や、山田千鶴子です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am Chizuko Yamada!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 情報魔法に関しては、難しいと思ったことがない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Regarding Information Magic, I've never thought it was difficult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教師達も、ちゃんとした知識が無さそうでもあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even the teachers didn't seem to have proper knowledge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうか。優秀な学生は素晴らしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see. Excellent students are wonderful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 卒業後は、国のために力を貸してくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After graduation, please lend your strength to the country."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい……でも……情報魔法は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes... but... Information Magic is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「情報魔法は……地味な魔法ですから。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Information Magic... is a plain magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: できることも、少なくて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are only a few things it can do..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……誰がそう言ったのかね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Who told you that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教師か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Was it a teacher?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい……情報魔法は、補助的な……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes... Information Magic is supplementary...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いにも生活にも、大した役には立たないって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It doesn't really help much in combat or daily life."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから……たぶん、どこかのお役所に勤めて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because of that... probably working at some government office,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お給金の計算をして、生きていくん、だって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: calculating salaries to make a living... that's what it said."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言った途端、ガンジー王子は困った表情をして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As soon as she said it, Prince Gandhi made a troubled face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子はすぐに後悔した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Chizuko immediately regretted it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目の前の物知らずの小娘を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was wondering how to support this ignorant young girl in front of him without hurting her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どう傷つけずにフォローしようか迷っている。
そんな風に思ったから。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because he thought that way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「教師で、その程度の認識なのか……参るな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A teacher with that level of understanding... it's hopeless."
"Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大きなものを扱えば扱うほど、情報は必要だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The bigger the things you handle, the more information you need.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会社、軍隊、国家……それを、地味などと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Companies, armies, nations... to call that plain..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あ、ありがとう、ございます……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Th-thank you very much..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや。……しかし、これが教育の現場か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No. ...But this is the reality of the education system..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーは眉をひそめた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gandhi frowned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「進学校でさえ、実態は貴族の社交場。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even prestigious schools are actually aristocratic social clubs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身分によって、出す試験の内容さえ違う」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The exams given differ according to one's social status."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無闇に易しい試験で高得点を取った者が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those who score high on arbitrarily easy exams

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 成績優秀者となる……これでは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: become top students... With this system,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人材など育つわけがない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's no way to cultivate true talent."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、王子殿下も、それを……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-oh, Your Highness, you also see that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ。視察に来たのだがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. I came here to inspect.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教師陣はおべっかを使うばかりで……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The teachers only flatter...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内密に様子を探れば、こうだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But when I secretly checked the situation, this is what I found."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「裕福で向上心があれば家庭教師を雇うが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those who are wealthy and ambitious hire private tutors,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どちらかが欠けた時点で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but if either is missing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に国を支えるような人材とはなりえない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they cannot become the kind of talent that supports the country..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦悩に満ちた表情で、ガンジー王子は頭を振った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a face full of anguish, Prince Gandhi shook his head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はな、山田君。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You see, Yamada-kun,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この国を……変えたいと、思っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to... change this country.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身分による差別や、旧弊を取りやめて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to abolish discrimination based on status and old customs..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「王に即位した際には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When I ascend to the throne,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実力ある者が素直に台頭し、力が振るえる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: those with ability will rise honestly and wield power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな社会にしたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to create such a society."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かはすぐに分かったのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although I immediately knew who it was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不躾な驚きがそのままでてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: an impolite surprise slipped out naturally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの第一王子。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The First Prince of Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアーク・スーパー・ガンジー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ragnarok Arc Super Gandhi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「君は……おお、見た覚えがある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You are... oh, I remember seeing you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 情報魔法学でトップだった、山田君だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were the top in Information Magic Studies, Yamada-kun."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分を、把握されていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He had understood who I was.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな、雲の上の人が。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone so far above me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「違ったらすまないな。合っていたかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I'm wrong, I apologize. Was I correct?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、ッ……はい、はい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes, yes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: や、山田千鶴子です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am Chizuko Yamada!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 情報魔法に関しては、難しいと思ったことがない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Regarding Information Magic, I've never thought it was difficult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教師達も、ちゃんとした知識が無さそうでもあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even the teachers didn't seem to have proper knowledge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうか。優秀な学生は素晴らしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see. Excellent students are wonderful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 卒業後は、国のために力を貸してくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After graduation, please lend your strength to the country."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい……でも……情報魔法は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes... but... Information Magic is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「情報魔法は……地味な魔法ですから。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Information Magic... is a plain magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: できることも、少なくて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are only a few things it can do..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……誰がそう言ったのかね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Who told you that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教師か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Was it a teacher?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい……情報魔法は、補助的な……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes... Information Magic is supplementary...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いにも生活にも、大した役には立たないって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It doesn't really help much in combat or daily life."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから……たぶん、どこかのお役所に勤めて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because of that... probably working at some government office,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お給金の計算をして、生きていくん、だって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: calculating salaries to make a living... that's what it said."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言った途端、ガンジー王子は困った表情をして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As soon as she said it, Prince Gandhi made a troubled face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子はすぐに後悔した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Chizuko immediately regretted it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目の前の物知らずの小娘を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was wondering how to support this ignorant young girl in front of him without hurting her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どう傷つけずにフォローしようか迷っている。
そんな風に思ったから。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because he thought that way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「教師で、その程度の認識なのか……参るな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A teacher with that level of understanding... it's hopeless."
"Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大きなものを扱えば扱うほど、情報は必要だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The bigger the things you handle, the more information you need.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会社、軍隊、国家……それを、地味などと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Companies, armies, nations... to call that plain..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あ、ありがとう、ございます……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Th-thank you very much..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや。……しかし、これが教育の現場か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No. ...But this is the reality of the education system..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーは眉をひそめた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gandhi frowned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「進学校でさえ、実態は貴族の社交場。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even prestigious schools are actually aristocratic social clubs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身分によって、出す試験の内容さえ違う」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The exams given differ according to one's social status."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無闇に易しい試験で高得点を取った者が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those who score high on arbitrarily easy exams

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 成績優秀者となる……これでは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: become top students... With this system,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人材など育つわけがない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's no way to cultivate true talent."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、王子殿下も、それを……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-oh, Your Highness, you also see that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ。視察に来たのだがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. I came here to inspect.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教師陣はおべっかを使うばかりで……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The teachers only flatter...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内密に様子を探れば、こうだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But when I secretly checked the situation, this is what I found."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「裕福で向上心があれば家庭教師を雇うが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those who are wealthy and ambitious hire private tutors,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どちらかが欠けた時点で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but if either is missing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に国を支えるような人材とはなりえない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they cannot become the kind of talent that supports the country..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦悩に満ちた表情で、ガンジー王子は頭を振った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a face full of anguish, Prince Gandhi shook his head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はな、山田君。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You see, Yamada-kun,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この国を……変えたいと、思っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to... change this country.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身分による差別や、旧弊を取りやめて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to abolish discrimination based on status and old customs..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「王に即位した際には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When I ascend to the throne,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実力ある者が素直に台頭し、力が振るえる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: those with ability will rise honestly and wield power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな社会にしたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to create such a society."
